00029 template <class UI, class Model, class WidgetType = QWidget>
00030 class TDesignerGuiObserverCompBase:
00031                      public ibase::TModelObserverCompWrap<
00032                                           iqtgui::TGuiObserverWrap< iqtgui::TDesignerGuiCompBase<UI, WidgetType>, imod::TSingleModelObserverBase<Model> > >
00033 {
00034 public:
00035        typedef ibase::TModelObserverCompWrap<
00036                             iqtgui::TGuiObserverWrap< iqtgui::TDesignerGuiCompBase<UI, WidgetType>, imod::TSingleModelObserverBase<Model> > > BaseClass;
00037 
00038        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TDesignerGuiObserverCompBase);
00039               I_REGISTER_INTERFACE(imod::IModelEditor);
00040               I_ASSIGN(m_isReadOnlyAttrPtr, "EditorReadOnly", "If enabled, the editor for the data model is always read only", false, false);
00041        I_END_COMPONENT;
00042 
00043        // reimplemented (imod::IModelEditor)
00044        virtual void SetReadOnly(bool state);
00045 
00046 protected:
00047        // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00048        virtual void OnComponentCreated();
00049 
00050 private:
00051        I_ATTR(bool, m_isReadOnlyAttrPtr);
00052 };
00053

00055 // public methods
00056 
00057 // reimplemented (imod::IModelEditor)
00058 
00059 template <class UI, class Model, class WidgetType>
00060 void TDesignerGuiObserverCompBase<UI, Model, WidgetType>::SetReadOnly(bool state)
00061 {
00062        // Skip state changes for "permanent-read-only" configured editors:
00063        if (m_isReadOnlyAttrPtr.IsValid() && *m_isReadOnlyAttrPtr){
00064               return;
00065        }
00066        
00067        BaseClass::SetReadOnly(state);
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00071 // protected methods
00072 
00073 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
00074 
00075 template <class UI, class Model, class WidgetType>
00076 void TDesignerGuiObserverCompBase<UI, Model, WidgetType>::OnComponentCreated()
00077 {
00078        BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00079 
00080        if (m_isReadOnlyAttrPtr.IsValid()){
00081               m_isReadOnly = *m_isReadOnlyAttrPtr;
00082        }
00083 }
